Reviews.Title: Wanst what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I had it returned because it wasnt what I wanted nor even the correct color. Ireturned it and still have not recieved my money back.

Reviews.Title: worst purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: From the minute we made the purchase it has been nothing but a hassle. Right off the bat didn't get a tracking number. And once I did I tracked it and it had been delivered to Chicago. Were in Montana.... I contacted the seller and they immediately responded and sent out a new phone. When we recieved the phone the quality of the phone was terrible. It's almost like a toy phone. Very dissatisfied. And on top of it all it took a month and 4 days to get here.

Reviews.Title: regular
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: this device has not filled my expectations. I mention an android, gps capable, and really it is not, the phone is really attractive, but only that, I have to buy a more expensive order, enter social networks and download applications

Reviews.Title: phone

Reviews.Content: I did not like this phone it's a off brand phone and I sent it back. The keys does not work n when I place my sim card in the phone its still didn't work

Reviews.Title: Fake
Reviews.Author: Deborah
Reviews.Content: The phone that came to me was not a i9220 but it was a '9330.. #Fake, It is niot even the same size as the real galexy note that I though I was buying, the cases bought were alot bigger. They were suppose to fit #The real thing. A waist of money, Plus it does not come with a memory or anything. THE PHONE SUCK! The Tv does not work, Niether does Radio, plus the camera sucks! This is a waist of money! DO NOT BUY THIS! it is a fake chinese knock off,,... bad knock off phone!
